title: Ousted Princess
description: Tutor the boy who shattered my heart? Not a chance!! I was humiliated at the end of freshman year. Now I focus on my studies and avoid my former friend and love of my life, Sean Courtright. And I was doing just fine on both accounts until my favorite professor asked me for a favor.If the request had come from anyone else, I would have turned him down. Oh boy, I should have … Being cramped in the same study room each day, his familiar scent wraps around me like a warm blanket. I can't resist his charm, his perfect smile, and his zeal for life! And as if he wasn’t tempting enough, Sean raises the stakes and makes me an offer, one I can’t possibly refuse. Will fate allow us a second chance at love? Or will it all come crash down, for the second time?A Pocahontas Retelling.
author: Tasha   Lewis
